title: 306 - Hit a Wall? Use These 3 Steps for Finding Your Creative Flow Again
description:
Listen & Subscribe on Apple Podcasts
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/creative-pep-talk/id929743897

Get Episode Transcripts at creative-pep-talk.simplecast.com

- - -

Joseph Campbell Hero’s Journey Book
https://www.amazon.com/Thousand-Faces-Collected-Joseph-Campbell/dp/1577315936/ref=pd_lpo_14_t_0/141-7894340-5132032?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=1577315936&pd_rd_r=a718122b-7e27-40f0-80b0-7a4534c4e3e5&pd_rd_w=KGixl&pd_rd_wg=ctaHH&pf_rd_p=16b28406-aa34-451d-8a2e-b3930ada000c&pf_rd_r=X8QRHDDJ5PY5WFPPC20M&psc=1&refRID=X8QRHDDJ5PY5WFPPC20M

 

Hegelian Delectic
https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/hegel-dialectics/

 

- - -

SPONSORS

- - -

MIGHTIER
Mightier is helping kids build emotional strength with video games.     Using the challenges already built into video games, Mightier creates opportunities for players to practice calming exercises to build their emotional muscle memory. With just 45 minutes of play a week, your child will become more aware of their emotions, and will learn how to use calming strategies in the moment. Find out more at mightier.com/MIGHTYPIZZA

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to skillshare.com/creativepep to get started!!!

SHILLINGTON
Study 9 months part-time Graphic Design Boot Camp from anywhere. With Shillington’s online graphic design course, you’ll graduate with a solid understanding of creative problem solving, design theory and software. Create an incredible design portfolio and master how to discuss and sell your work—essential skills for any creative career. LEARN MORE: https://shillo.online/creativepeptalk
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Andy J. Pizza)

itunes:title: 306 - Hit a Wall? Use These 3 Steps for Finding Your Creative Flow Again
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
A goal can be a powerful motivator, but what happens when the world changes and your goal becomes impossible? What do you do when every effort you make doesn’t seem to change any outcome?

In this episode we dive into a strategy for when your motivation gets destroyed by lack of progress. This process was a game changer for me and in this episode not only will you hear why, but you’ll feel my excitement too!
itunes:subtitle:

In this episode we dive into a strategy for when your motivation gets destroyed by lack of progress. This process was a game changer for me and in this episode not only will you hear why, but you’ll feel my excitement too!
itunes:keywords: philosophy, design, hegelian dialectic, hero's journey, creative, story structure, self help, motivation, inspiration, joseph campbell, illustration
